product_name: Patagonia Light Flyer Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Light Flyer Jacket is the lightest weight, most breathable waterproof/windproof shell from Patagonia for the runner who needs complete weather protection. Innovative GORE-TEX(R) Active fabric offers super-lightweight, highly breathable, wet-weather protection that's 30% lighter than other GORE-TEX laminates. Upper-arm zippers guide airflow through always-open (but protected) rear vents. Stand-up collar is lined with lightweight mesh for warmth and softness. Articulated sleeves let your arms move freely, and a slightly dropped tail has your back. On cold days, extra-coverage cuffs unfold into mittens; waterproof pocket at center back holds essentials. Reflective logos on chest and center-back neck. Patagonia Light Flyer Jacket for women has a slim fit to reduce wind resistance. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Light Flyer Jacket is the lightest weight, most breathable waterproof/windproof shell from Patagonia for the runner who needs complete weather protection.
